Technical Excellence.description: Quality and impact of technical work delivered
Technical Excellence.measurement: Based on technical accomplishments, code reviews, and peer feedback

Project Delivery.description: Effectiveness in delivering projects on time and within scope
Project Delivery.measurement: Project success metrics, stakeholder feedback, delivery timeliness

Business Impact.description: Measurable contribution to business objectives and outcomes
Business Impact.measurement: Quantifiable business metrics and impact assessments

Leadership & Collaboration.description: Ability to lead, influence, and work effectively with others

Professional Development.description: Growth, learning, and skill development throughout the year
Professional Development.measurement: Learning objectives, certification achievements, skill demonstrations

5.label: Exceptional
5.description: Consistently exceeds expectations, demonstrates outstanding performance

4.label: Exceeds Expectations
4.description: Regularly surpasses goals, strong performance across most areas

3.label: Meets Expectations
3.description: Achieves goals and objectives, solid performance

2.label: Below Expectations
2.description: Performance gaps exist, improvement needed in key areas

1.label: Unsatisfactory
1.description: Significant performance issues, immediate improvement required
